title: BBQ Rub (Allheilmittel)
instructions: Crush the peppercorns and coarse sea salt in a mortar and fill them into a blender. Depending on the size of the mortar, do not fill everything at once to prevent the peppercorns from bouncing out. I grind each spoon separately in my small mortar. Then add the remaining ingredients to the blender and mix for about 1 minute. I always fill the mixture into a jar and season the grilled meat as desired. I also use it as a substitute for granulated broth in various dishes when I feel something is missing in the background. In my kitchen, it is a universal remedy :-).
